name: Bulk Fields Editor
author: Termel

sections.description:
Bulk edit:

  • users meta fields
  • post and CPT categories
  • Gravity Forms entries fields

Use new sub menu under users (network level if multisite) : Bulk Edit Users.
Use new sub menu under posts : Bulk Edit Posts.
Use new sub menu under Gravity Forms submenu : Bulk Edit Fields.
sections.installation:
Easy

  • Search via plugins > add new.
  • Find the plugin listed and click activate.
  • Use new sub menu under users (network level if multisite) : Bulk Edit Users
sections.changelog:
1.8.0 – control gravity forms max entries to fetch

1.7.2 – user_url bug fixed : http://lists.automattic.com/pipermail/wp-hackers/2012-August/044226.html

1.7.1 – user_url meta field added

1.7 – Gravity Forms fields update possible based on a condition

1.6 – CPT added

1.5.6 – new updated message

1.5.5 – fixes extra space in php file, srewing rss feeds

1.5.4 – fixes for real and dry run

1.5.3 – Max entries managed

1.5.2 – If one form, add blank one

1.5.1 – Dry run added

1.5 – New source added : Gravity Forms

1.4 – post category change fixed

1.3 – adding bulk post category changes

1.2.1 – cosmetic update

1.2 – date range added with nice jqueryui datepicker

1.1.2 – enhanced user dropdown (WP built-in one is not so good)

1.1.1 – bug fix

1.1 – now can update a single user or all users in a specific role

1.0 – First stable release.
